Message:
When I was eight,
a disease came and
assaulted our village.

a disease unheard of by all
that turns the body into a tree.

Once symptoms appear,
the time it takes to
completely turn varies
from person to person.

For some, it may take months
for even an arm to turn,
while others...are a part of
the forest in a matter of days.

My mother and my
symptoms were mild.

Their feet took root
in the ground...
and have since lost
the ability to move
from that spot.

In an attempt to
save everyone,
my mother searched
high and low for a way
to cure the disease.

But, no matter how
hard she searched,
she never found a cure.

I can say this now,
but it’s no surprise
she couldn’t find one.
